GLUE-Math with POSIX standard
Test Suite:
  Gaussian Complementary Error Function

Polymorphism Pattern: Real variable -> Real solution
>>> RMath.erfc(x)
  (x)   float     double             long double         
 -6.0   2.000000  2.000000000000000  1.999999999999999979
 -5.5   2.000000  1.999999999999993  1.999999999999992642

Property of Pole
float:
erf(Infinity) =  0.0
erf(-Infinity) =  2
erf(NaN) = NaN
double:
erf(Infinity) =  0.0
erf(-Infinity) =  2
erf(NaN) = NaN
long double:
erf(Infinity) =  0.0
erf(-Infinity) =  2
erf(NaN) = NaN
